nodes.id: 中华人民共和国铁道部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国铁道部
en: Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区复兴路10号

description.zh-cn: 已撤销的中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，曾主管中国大陆的铁路运输。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which was responsible for railway transport in mainland China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十二届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第十二届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
en: First Session of the 12th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 该次会议审议通过了《国务院机构改革和职能转变方案》，决定撤销铁道部。
description.en: This session reviewed and approved the 'State Council Institutional Reform and Functional Transformation Plan', deciding to abolish the Ministry of Railways.

nodes.id: 国务院机构改革和职能转变方案

zh-cn: 国务院机构改革和职能转变方案
en: State Council Institutional Reform and Functional Transformation Plan

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在实行铁路政企分开的改革方案，根据该方案，铁道部被撤销。
description.en: A reform plan aimed at separating government functions from enterprise management in the railway sector, under which the Ministry of Railways was abolished.

description.zh-cn: 根据2013年国务院机构改革方案组建，由交通运输部管理，承担原铁道部的行政职责。
description.en: Established in 2013 under the State Council's institutional reform plan, it is managed by the Ministry of Transport and assumes the administrative functions of the former Ministry of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 根据2013年国务院机构改革方案组建，承担原铁道部的企业职责。后改制为中国国家铁路集团有限公司。
description.en: Established in 2013 under the State Council's institutional reform plan to assume the corporate functions of the former Ministry of Railways. It was later restructured into China State Railway Group Co., Ltd.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国交通运输部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国交通运输部
en: Ministry of Transport of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，主管交通运输行业。原铁道部的部分行政职责被划入该部。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the transport industry. Some administrative functions of the former Ministry of Railways were transferred to this ministry.

en: Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国铁道部的前身，是中央人民政府政务院的组成部门。
description.en: The predecessor of the Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China, a constituent department of the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government.

nodes.id: 第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
en: First Session of the 1st National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 该次会议通过了《中华人民共和国宪法》和《中华人民共和国国务院组织法》，成立了国务院，并将中央人民政府铁道部改组为中华人民共和国铁道部。
description.en: This session passed the Constitution of the People's Republic of China and the Organic Law of the State Council, established the State Council, and reorganized the Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government into the Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国交通部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国交通部
en: Ministry of Communications of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1970年至1975年间，铁道部、原交通部、邮电部合并成立的机构。
description.en: An organization formed by the merger of the Ministry of Railways, the former Ministry of Communications, and the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications between 1970 and 1975.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国邮电部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国邮电部
en: Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门，1970年曾与铁道部等合并为交通部。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which was merged with the Ministry of Railways and others to form the Ministry of Communications in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 中国的政治运动，在此期间铁路事业受到重创，铁道部一度实行军事管制。
description.en: A political movement in China, during which the railway industry was severely damaged, and the Ministry of Railways was placed under military control for a time.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任铁道部部长和中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Minister of Railways and Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任铁道部部长和中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Minister of Railways and Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任铁道部部长、中共中央政治局委员、全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Minister of Railways, a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任铁道部部长和中共中央顾问委员会常务委员会委员。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Minister of Railways and a member of the Standing Committee of the Central Advisory Commission of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任铁道部部长、中共中央政治局委员、中共中央书记处书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Minister of Railways, a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, and a secretary of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任铁道部部长、最高人民检察院检察长、中共中央纪律检查委员会副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Minister of Railways, Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, and Deputy Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国铁道部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Railways of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华人民共和国铁道部最后一任部长。
description.en: Chinese politician and the last Minister of Railways of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 2011年甬台温铁路列车追尾事故

zh-cn: 2011年甬台温铁路列车追尾事故

description.zh-cn: 一起发生在中国浙江省温州市的严重铁路事故，该事故使铁道部备受社会质疑，要求撤销铁道部的呼声再起。
description.en: A serious railway accident that occurred in Wenzhou, Zhejiang Province, China. The incident led to widespread public questioning of the Ministry of Railways and renewed calls for its abolition.

description.zh-cn: 由中国铁路总公司改制成立的国有独资企业，原铁道部机关驻地现为其总部。
description.en: A state-owned sole proprietorship enterprise reformed from the China Railway Corporation. The former headquarters of the Ministry of Railways now serves as its headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 原铁道部下属的铁路局之一。
description.en: One of the railway bureaus under the former Ministry of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 原铁道部下属的铁路局之一。
description.en: One of the railway bureaus under the former Ministry of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 原铁道部下属的铁路局之一。
description.en: One of the railway bureaus under the former Ministry of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任铁道部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Minister of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任铁道部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Minister of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任铁道部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Minister of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任铁道部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Minister of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任铁道部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Minister of Railways.

en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议
en: First Plenary Session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 该次会议通过了《中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法》，为中央人民政府铁道部的设置提供了法律依据。
description.en: This session passed the 'Organic Law of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China', providing the legal basis for the establishment of the Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国铁道部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国铁道部是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门。
description.en: The Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China was a constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 第十二届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 国务院机构改革和职能转变方案

description.zh-cn: 第十二届全国人民代表大会第一次会议审议通过了《国务院机构改革和职能转变方案》。
description.en: The First Session of the 12th National People's Congress reviewed and approved the 'State Council Institutional Reform and Functional Transformation Plan'.

relationships.source: 国务院机构改革和职能转变方案
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国铁道部

description.zh-cn: 根据《国务院机构改革和职能转变方案》，铁道部被撤销。
description.en: According to the 'State Council Institutional Reform and Functional Transformation Plan', the Ministry of Railways was abolished.

relationships.source: 国务院机构改革和职能转变方案
relationships.target: 国家铁路局

description.zh-cn: 根据《国务院机构改革和职能转变方案》，组建了国家铁路局，承担铁道部的行政职责。
description.en: According to the 'State Council Institutional Reform and Functional Transformation Plan', the National Railway Administration was established to assume the administrative functions of the Ministry of Railways.

relationships.source: 国务院机构改革和职能转变方案
relationships.target: 中国铁路总公司

description.zh-cn: 根据《国务院机构改革和职能转变方案》，组建了中国铁路总公司，承担铁道部的企业职责。
description.en: According to the 'State Council Institutional Reform and Functional Transformation Plan', the China Railway Corporation was established to assume the corporate functions of the Ministry of Railways.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国交通运输部

description.zh-cn: 国家铁路局由交通运输部管理。
description.en: The National Railway Administration is managed by the Ministry of Transport.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 中央人民政府铁道部

description.zh-cn: 1954年9月第一届全国人大一次会议后，中央人民政府铁道部结束，其职能由新成立的中华人民共和国铁道部接替。
description.en: After the First Session of the 1st National People's Congress in September 1954, the Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government was concluded, and its functions were taken over by the newly established Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国铁道部

description.zh-cn: 1954年9月第一届全国人大一次会议后，原中央人民政府铁道部改组为中华人民共和国铁道部。
description.en: After the First Session of the 1st National People's Congress in September 1954, the former Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government was reorganized into the Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议
relationships.target: 中央人民政府铁道部

description.zh-cn: 根据1949年9月中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议通过的《中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法》，设置了中央人民政府铁道部。
description.en: The Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government was established in accordance with the 'Organic Law of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China' passed by the First Plenary Session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in September 1949.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国交通部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国铁道部

description.zh-cn: 1970年至1975年间，铁道部与交通部、邮电部合并，其独立建制被暂时撤销。
description.en: Between 1970 and 1975, the Ministry of Railways was merged with the Ministry of Communications and the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications, and its independent establishment was temporarily abolished.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国铁道部

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，铁路事业受到重创，中共中央和国务院于1967年对铁道部实行军事管制。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the railway industry was severely damaged, and the CPC Central Committee and the State Council imposed military control over the Ministry of Railways in 1967.

relationships.target: 中央人民政府铁道部

relationships.source: 2011年甬台温铁路列车追尾事故
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国铁道部

description.zh-cn: 事故发生后，铁道部在调查和处理中的方法备受社会质疑及谴责，要求撤销铁道部的呼声再次出现，对其存续构成阻碍。
description.en: After the accident, the Ministry of Railways' investigation and handling methods were widely questioned and condemned by society, and calls for its abolition resurfaced, posing an obstacle to its continued existence.

relationships.target: 中国国家铁路集团

description.zh-cn: 中国铁路总公司改制为中国国家铁路集团有限公司。
description.en: China Railway Corporation was restructured into China State Railway Group Co., Ltd.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国铁道部

description.zh-cn: 哈尔滨铁路局是原铁道部直属的铁路局之一。
description.en: Harbin Railway Bureau was one of the railway bureaus directly under the former Ministry of Railways.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国铁道部

description.zh-cn: 沈阳铁路局是原铁道部直属的铁路局之一。
description.en: Shenyang Railway Bureau was one of the railway bureaus directly under the former Ministry of Railways.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国铁道部

description.zh-cn: 北京铁路局是原铁道部直属的铁路局之一。
description.en: Beijing Railway Bureau was one of the railway bureaus directly under the former Ministry of Railways.

relationships.target: 中央人民政府铁道部

description.zh-cn: 1951年2月中共中央发出《关于加强铁道政治部工作的指示》，推动了铁路系统自上而下建立政治部。
description.en: In February 1951, the CPC Central Committee issued the 'Instruction on Strengthening the Work of Railway Political Departments', promoting the establishment of political departments from top to bottom within the railway system.
